body.name: Gahenwo 60" Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick with Remote for Cell Phone 4"-7", Portable Smartphone Tripod Stand Compatible with iPhone Android, Lightweight Travel Tripod for Selfies Video Recording Vlog
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Unlimited 360° rotation】 Gahenwo tripod for iphone can be rotated 360°, support top down, back up, horizontal and vertical screen rotation, free photo angle to meet your daily shooting needs. The cell phone holder can support phones with a width of 2.16in-3.46in (screen size of 4-7 inches), compatible with almost all cell phones. Built-in anti-slip pads to protect your phone from falling.

【Portable All-in-1 Design】 Unlike traditional phone tripod stand, Gahenwo Multi-Function Selfie Stick Tripod with Integrated Design, 8-section retractable pole and collapsible legs allow complete storage as a tube up to 11 inches (28cm) long. Beautiful and stylish while compact design is easy to carry without taking up space, is a good companion for outdoor travel.

【Stable Tripod】 The phone tripod utilizes the principle of triangular stability, while increasing the chassis force area, increasing the moment of force, When it is used as a tripod it can be very stable and not easy to shake. One button unlock tripod design, it does not require complicated assembly, just press the BUTTON button at the bottom to unlock the tripod easily. The tripod is equipped with anti-slip pads for greater stability when unfolded.

【Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote】Equipped with a 50 mAh long-lasting rechargeable remote control, which is IOS/Android compatible and is capable of 10-meter remote selfies with a simple Bluetooth connection. The remote control is embedded removable design, simple to take out, it can also be mounted on a tripod leg when it is not needed to prevent loss.

【Stretchable and Comfortable】This iPhone selfie stick is designed with an 8-section aluminum alloy material telescopic pole, strong and durable, the longest can be stretched up to 60 inches so that you can freely adjust the height (length) to capture a wider view. Suitable for selfies, videos, live streaming, group photos and more.

productInformation.value: All-in-1, Telescopic, Lightweight, Remote Control, Adjustable angle

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The cell phone tripod consists of eight sections of telescopic rods, which can be freely adjusted in height by gently pulling, very convenient and simple to use. Aluminum alloy material makes it durable and corrosion-resistant, and it can be used normally even in humid environments.

Use as a cell phone tripod The legs of the tripod have been improved to increase the chassis force area and torque, which makes it very stable and not easy to shake when used as a tripod. Use as a phone selfie stick When used as a selfie stick, you just need to pull the cell phone clamp or handle, install the cell phone, adjust the angle and then you can use it. Simple operation, you can take a wide angle view without the help of others. Rechargeable Wireless Remote Control The wireless remote pairs instantly with your phone to take multiple photos within a 10-meter range, and it features a detachable design that can be placed in the groove of your travel tripod when not in use, making it easy to store while preventing loss. State-of-the-art Holder The clip of the cell phone holder can be rotated 360°, support top down and top up shooting, and also switch forward/backward 110 degrees, horizontal and vertical screen rotation, the photo angle is free, to meet your daily shooting needs. 8-section aluminum alloy telescopic pole The cell phone selfie stick tripod features an 8-section adjustable telescopic pole with sufficient height, adjustable from 11 inches to 60 inches. Therefore, this selfie stick for iPhone can capture a wider landscape, meet people's needs for different shooting heights, suitable for different scenarios, even for tall people. Suitable for selfies, live streaming, group photos and more. Anti-slip pad design for extra stability The three-leg foot pads are made of silicone, which is non-slip and friction-resistant, so you don't have to worry about tipping over even if it is placed on a smooth surface.

Compatible with almost all smartphones, such as iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 14/14 Plus/14 Pro/Pro Max, iPhone 13 12 pro/pro max/iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, iPhone X/XS/XS Max/XR, OnePlus 6T/6/5T/5/3T/3, 8 Plus/8/7 Plus/7/6s Plus/6s/6Plus/6/5s/5c/5, Motorola Moto G6 Play/G7.

How to use of vertical screen Rotate the phone holder 90° towards the remote control side, and then rotate the phone holder to the front to complete the vertical screen operation. Note: Prohibited to force the holder down in the direction which it can only 20° tilt, otherwise it will be damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Gahenwo 60" Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick, and it has exceeded my expectations. The compatibility with both iPhone and Android devices makes it versatile for any user. Connecting my phone to the tripod is a breeze – the adjustable phone holder securely accommodates devices ranging from 4 to 7 inches. The process is quick and straightforward, providing a snug fit without any wobbling. The reliable grip ensures that my phone stays in place, allowing for stable shots and recordings. The lightweight design makes it perfect for travel, and the remote control adds convenience for capturing selfies and videos. Overall, it's a reliable and user-friendly accessory for anyone looking to enhance their smartphone photography and videography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing surprised me! It sturdy but lightweight. It is easy to manipulate. Has a remote sensor. And it’s very quick to deploy with a very grippy phone holder. Plus the built environment n tripod is excellent. Much better than my first selfie stick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars for VR softball training
reviews.reviewText: got this to use with blast vision to train my daughter on her swings in softball. Our coach has us doing some pretty cool drills and this allows us to hold the phone up and record her swings and the vr blast vision allows us to track her swings and get estimates on where the balls went with velocity and visuals. very cool stuff. The remote works great as well for traditional photo taking. the stand is sturdy and stood up to some nice winds. Its compact and travels well. a little pricey but looks and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Selfie Stick-Tripod perfection - almost
reviews.reviewText: PLUSES: This longer, well-made, combo selfie stick/tripod with removable remote and rotating head (for horizontal and vertical phone shooting) works well, good value, and I can recommend it highly. Very packable, transportable. Easy to deploy. MINUSES (one star off): Only note these minor negatives: Like most selfie tripods, this is lightweight and may tip over (although this one has wider than average legs). Also, I would like to see a better designed remote that is easier to take in and out of slot on tripod legs, and somehow attached to minimize falling out and loosing. Other that those, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So compact and light!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this. It tunnels down so small you can carry it easily. but it also pops up super tall if needed. Its decently sturdy as long as the surface is relatively flat. The clicker is bluetooth and connects quickly. Wish the top/camera holder part would rotate more than the few angles. But so far loving it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Capturing all of life's moments
reviews.reviewText: The Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick is a game-changer for capturing moments with ease. Its expandable design ensures the perfect height for any situation, while the stability is top-notch, providing a steady platform for my phone. The added convenience of a remote control makes snapping photos or recording videos a breeze, making it a must-have accessory for anyone who wants versatility and reliability in one compact device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one to buy
reviews.reviewText: I'd never seen one of these till a couple of months ago, when a friend lent me his, made by a different company and more lightweight. The legs broke almost immediately and honestly, it was junk. But I liked the idea of the mechanism. So I jumped online, and after comparison shopping, I bought this. Honestly, I feel like I hit the jackpot. This is an incredibly sturdy, solid yet relatively lightweight tripod and selfie-stick. It's in a completely different league than my friend's tripod/selfie-stick, when now seems like a toy. I've only had good experiences using the Gahenwo tripod thus far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price! Sturdy, compact, sleek and the Bluetooth remote evens works for instagram!
Fácil de usar, práctico.cumplio con mis expectatuvas

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente combo, qualidade sensacional pelo preço e funcionalidade, vindo até com as ilhas do não use e do teclado, estão de parabéns pelo produto e rapidez na entrega, com certeza indico e compraria novamente 👏🏼
reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente produto e firme em sua haste do tripé
reviews.reviewText: Excelente produto, controle funciona bem, base do tripé e haste firme, e embora uma demora pequena demora devido os procedimentos alfandegários, com certeza indico e compraria novamente. Quem viaja sozinho sabe a importância de tripé de qualidade como este 👍

Nice tripod for many uses. I mean, it's designed for your smartphone, but you can use that to film or take still pics (with the Bluetooth remote included) in a variety of ways. Also folds back up into a selfie stick, the remote clicks into the handle.I bought one for my son, and I had to get 1 for myself for filming cars in the summer. Great price.
Muy buena compra, muy estable y fácil de usar. Funciona perfecto con mi teléfono que es pesado.

Cannot complain for the priceIt is good enough given the price.I am happy with it. Both selfie and tripod function well.Of course it will not stand on very windy location as tripod. But indoors works well.
